Description:
Opportunity you do not want to miss!
This is an opportunity of a lifetime presents itself to consult the drawing board and convert this field of dreams into something spectacular, which is perfectly located, clean and level vacant home site with an easy access to every amenity.
Strategic location in a premium pocket of Cloverton, set among quality homes, this substantial sized allotment is the perfect fit for many of today's home makers.
This area offers: local shopping centres, public transport, schools, parkland & access to major arterial roads.
Excellent dimensions with approx 448sqm are ready for your desired dream.
Contact Vishal to find out more information, 0476 641 044

Description:
Quality, Class and Cloverton Convenience
Completed late 2016, this impressive 3BR home delivers a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle in Clovertons popular Kallo precinct with its free-flowing design and tasteful appointments throughout. An abundance of natural light throughout, the homes as-new interior boasts an extra-large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (BIRs) and stylish main bathroom. Add to this an expansive open-plan living/dining area and superb granite-top kitchen with breakfast bar, Technika cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other features of the home include ducted heating and split-system a/c, full-size laundry, plus an internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) and sizeable backyard. Close proximity to Clovertons coming lifestyle attractions as well as easy access to Donnybrook Station and Hume Freeway. Why build when you can simply move in and enjoy!

Experience Luxury Living..
This almost completed family home delivers a finished package of quality and class that's yours to simply move in and enjoy! Situated in the popular Kallo precinct, the homes spacious interior showcases three bedrooms (two with BIRs, master with WIR & Stylish Ensuite), main family bathroom, separate lounge/theatre room and open-plan living/dining area complemented by a beautiful stone-top kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, oversized walk in pantry and pendant lighting. Add to this ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout, double garage (remote-controlled) with internal entry, plus alfresco area perfect for entertaining. Close to everything this vibrant new community will have to enjoy as well as easy access to Donnybrook Station and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Ready, Set, Grow!
An exciting new address awaits, north of Melbourne, in what is set to become the place to be, offering broad appeal for savvy investors, families seeking modern community lifestyles and market entrants with a vision for the future. The site of your dream home, this generous allotment of approximately 541m2, presents a vast flat parcel with access to all town services, located in Cloverton Estates, Kallo precinct. Bordered on either side by streamlined commuting options, (Hume Highway access and the existing Vline rail service), you will be set to benefit from a wealth of proposed amenities including a vibrant town with shopping centre, health facilities, quality schooling options and so much more. Nestled in a tranquil urban fringe, amongst other quality built homes, you are only minutes to Craigieburn Central, Epping shopping district, Donnybrook hotel and the Growling Frog golf course. A unique opportunity to create your dream lifestyle in the suburb of the future.
Insights: 23 Mulgrave Boulevard, Kalkallo VIC 3064 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Invest For The Future!
Bring your paint brushes to this one as this home needs some TLC and elbow grease. Huge in size and offers four bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in-robe, central bathroom and remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes.
Two generous sized studies, a very spacious open plan kitchen/meals, family room, separate lounge and a large billiard/gaming room which flows to the generous outdoor patio leading to a 6-car carport followed by an enormous workshop.
The property has dual street access at both the front and rear of the property. Fantastic access to the Hume Freeway, only 3km (approx) to Donnybrook station and only 3.5km (approx) to the proposed Merrifield town centre. This is a fantastic opportunity to invest for the future.
Insights: 10 Malcolm Street, Kalkallo VIC 3064 was last sold in 2017 and 51 other 4 bedroom house in Kalkallo have recently been sold.

Description:
LARGE ALLOTMENT IN A PRIME ESTATE!
Situated within the Cloverton estate, this large allotment titled in June 2017 provides all the space and convenience you need to build your dream home. Measuring 16m x32m and totalling 512m2 this home site is highly suited to most home designs and provides ample scope for a great entertaining area and children’s playground. Cloverton will become a centre of education for northern Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all being developed. A major retail centre is being planned while public transport and medical services provide everything the community needs. Don't miss this rare chance to secure a parcel of land in such a sought after location.

Description:
I'm titled, ready to go and 448m2?.are you ready to build??
Situated in 'Cloverton' estate - Kalkallo, this impressive 448m2 North facing block of land with a frontage of 14 meters, will allow you to create a home that suits your lifestyle - being titled, you won't have to wait any longer to build your dream home!
Cloverton is an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice and when complete, Cloverton at Kalkallo - 35km from Melbourne's CBD - will be Victoria's biggest master planned community and home to 30,000 people?with an array of choices in education, employment, shopping, parks and outdoor spaces.
Don't miss out on this opportunity, enquire now!

Description:
Land to build your dream home!
A great opportunity to purchase a block in Stage 1 of the Seeds estate has now presented itself. Measuring an impressive 400m2 (12.5 X 32) this great block is titled and ready to start building you brand new home on.
A great lifestyle in the Kallo community awaits with all of life's necessities at your doorstep. Easy access to the Hume freeway, Donnybrook train station and the new Cloverton city makes this parcel land special in every way.
Highly Sought after Make your enquiries today!

Kalkallo Estate, Titled Land
Set in the heart of the northern growth corridor, the opportunity presents to secure this magnificent 462m2 parcel of land, already titled and ready to build on. With easy access to Hume Fwy, major shopping centres and V Line train to Melbourne commuting is a dream plus enjoy the serenity and comfort of the renowned Donnybrook hotel and Growling Frog golf club only minutes away. Call today to begin your dream!
